thread.title: Polish student designs robotic arm that plays music

title: Polish student designs robotic arm that plays music
text:
Polish student designs robotic arm that plays music 6:06pm GMT - 01:20 
A Polish engineering student has combined his passion for music with technology to design a robotic arm that plays music. Roselle Chen reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A Polish engineering student has combined his passion for music with technology to design a robotic arm that plays music. Roselle Chen reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2mQy5UM
